2.2 ReAct ç¤ºä¾‹

å‡è®¾ä»»åŠ¡æ˜¯ï¼šâ€œæŸ¥è¯¢åŒ—äº¬ä»Šå¤©çš„å¤©æ°”ï¼Œå¹¶æ ¹æ®å¤©æ°”æ¨èç©¿æ­â€

Task: æŸ¥è¯¢åŒ—äº¬ä»Šå¤©çš„å¤©æ°”ï¼Œå¹¶æ ¹æ®å¤©æ°”æ¨èç©¿æ­

Thought 1: æˆ‘éœ€è¦å…ˆæŸ¥è¯¢åŒ—äº¬ä»Šå¤©çš„å¤©æ°”æƒ…å†µ

Thought 3: æˆ‘å·²ç»è·å¾—äº†å¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯å’Œç©¿æ­æ¨èï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç»™å‡ºæœ€ç»ˆç­”æ¡ˆäº†
Answer: åŒ—äº¬ä»Šå¤©å¤©æ°”æ™´æœ—ï¼Œä½†æ°”æ¸©è¾ƒä½ï¼ˆ-2Â°C ~ 8Â°Cï¼‰ï¼Œæœ‰åŒ—é£3-4çº§ã€‚
        å»ºè®®ç©¿ç€ï¼šç¾½ç»’æœæ­é…æ¯›è¡£å’Œä¿æš–å†…è¡£ï¼Œå¤–å‡ºæ—¶å¸¦ä¸Šå›´å·¾ã€æ‰‹å¥—å’Œå¸½å­é˜²é£ä¿æš–ã€‚

2.3 ReAct çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿

ä¼˜åŠ¿ è¯´æ˜
å¯è§£é‡Šæ€§å¼º æ¯ä¸€æ­¥æ€è€ƒè¿‡ç¨‹éƒ½æ¸…æ™°å¯è§
çµæ´»é€‚åº” å¯æ ¹æ®è§‚å¯Ÿç»“æœåŠ¨æ€è°ƒæ•´ç­–ç•¥
å‡å°‘å¹»è§‰ é€šè¿‡å·¥å…·è·å–çœŸå®ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè€Œéçº¯é æ¨¡å‹ç”Ÿæˆ
é”™è¯¯å¯è¿½æº¯ å®¹æ˜“å®šä½é—®é¢˜å‘ç”Ÿåœ¨å“ªä¸ªæ­¥éª¤

2.4 ReAct ä»£ç å®ç°

from langchain.agents import AgentExecutor, create_react_agent
from langchain_openai import ChatOpenAI
from langchain.tools import Tool
from langchain import hub

# 1. å®šä¹‰å·¥å…·
def search_weather(city: str) -> str:
    """æŸ¥è¯¢åŸå¸‚å¤©æ°”"""
    # å®é™…åº”è°ƒç”¨å¤©æ°” API
    return f"{city}ä»Šæ—¥ï¼šæ™´ï¼Œ5Â°C ~ 15Â°C"

def calculate(expression: str) -> str:
    """è®¡ç®—æ•°å­¦è¡¨è¾¾å¼"""
    return str(eval(expression))

tools = [
    Tool(name="Weather", func=search_weather, description="æŸ¥è¯¢åŸå¸‚å¤©æ°”"),
    Tool(name="Calculator", func=calculate, description="è®¡ç®—æ•°å­¦è¡¨è¾¾å¼"),
]

# 2. åˆ›å»º ReAct Agent
llm = ChatOpenAI(model="gpt-4", temperature=0)
prompt = hub.pull("hwchase17/react")  # å®˜æ–¹ ReAct prompt æ¨¡æ¿

agent = create_react_agent(llm, tools, prompt)
agent_executor = AgentExecutor(agent=agent, tools=tools, verbose=True)

# 3. æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡
result = agent_executor.invoke({
    "input": "åŒ—äº¬ä»Šå¤©å¤©æ°”æ€ä¹ˆæ ·ï¼Ÿå¦‚æœæ°”æ¸©ä½äº10åº¦ï¼Œè®¡ç®—ç©¿3å±‚è¡£æœæ¯å±‚ä¿æš–2åº¦èƒ½æŠµå¾¡å¤šå°‘å¯’å†·"
})
print(result["output"])

3. æ­å»º Agent æ™ºèƒ½ä½“ç³»ç»Ÿ

3.1 æ­å»ºæµç¨‹æ¦‚è§ˆ

â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”

â”œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¤

â”‚  ç¡®å®šä»»åŠ¡è¾¹ç•Œ         é€‰æ‹©Agentæ¡†æ¶         å®šä¹‰å·¥å…·æ¥å£  â”‚
â”‚  æ˜ç¡®è¾“å…¥è¾“å‡º         è®¾è®¡è®°å¿†ç³»ç»Ÿ          å®ç°å·¥å…·é€»è¾‘  â”‚
â”‚  è¯„ä¼°å¤æ‚åº¦           è§„åˆ’æ‰§è¡Œç­–ç•¥          æµ‹è¯•å·¥å…·åŠŸèƒ½  â”‚
â”‚                                                         â”‚
â”‚  4ï¸âƒ£ Agentæ„å»º         5ï¸âƒ£ é›†æˆæµ‹è¯•          6ï¸âƒ£ éƒ¨ç½²ä¼˜åŒ–  â”‚
â”‚     â†“                    â†“                    â†“        â”‚

â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜

3.2 æ–¹æ¡ˆä¸€ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ LangChain æ„å»º

from langchain.agents import AgentExecutor, create_openai_tools_agent
from langchain_openai import ChatOpenAI
from langchain.tools import tool
from langchain_core.prompts import ChatPromptTemplate, MessagesPlaceholder
from langchain.memory import ConversationBufferMemory

# 1. å®šä¹‰å·¥å…·
@tool
def search_database(query: str) -> str:
    """åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­æœç´¢ä¿¡æ¯"""
    # å®ç°æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢é€»è¾‘
    return f"æœç´¢ç»“æœ: {query} çš„ç›¸å…³ä¿¡æ¯..."

@tool  
def send_email(to: str, subject: str, body: str) -> str:
    """å‘é€é‚®ä»¶"""
    # å®ç°é‚®ä»¶å‘é€é€»è¾‘
    return f"é‚®ä»¶å·²å‘é€ç»™ {to}"

@tool
def create_file(filename: str, content: str) -> str:
    """åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶"""
    with open(filename, 'w') as f:
        f.write(content)
    return f"æ–‡ä»¶ {filename} åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ"

tools = [search_database, send_email, create_file]

# 2. åˆ›å»º Prompt
prompt = ChatPromptTemplate.from_messages([
    ("system", """ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™ºèƒ½åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¸®åŠ©ç”¨æˆ·å®Œæˆå„ç§ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚
    ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹å·¥å…·ï¼šæœç´¢æ•°æ®åº“ã€å‘é€é‚®ä»¶ã€åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚
    è¯·æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©åˆé€‚çš„å·¥å…·å®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡ã€‚"""),
    MessagesPlaceholder(variable_name="chat_history"),
    ("user", "{input}"),
    MessagesPlaceholder(variable_name="agent_scratchpad"),
])

# 3. åˆ›å»º Agent
llm = ChatOpenAI(model="gpt-4", temperature=0)
agent = create_openai_tools_agent(llm, tools, prompt)

# 4. æ·»åŠ è®°å¿†
memory = ConversationBufferMemory(memory_key="chat_history", return_messages=True)

# 5. åˆ›å»ºæ‰§è¡Œå™¨
agent_executor = AgentExecutor(
    agent=agent,
    tools=tools,
    memory=memory,
    verbose=True,
    max_iterations=10,  # é˜²æ­¢æ— é™å¾ªç¯
    handle_parsing_errors=True
)

# 6. è¿è¡Œ
result = agent_executor.invoke({"input": "å¸®æˆ‘æŸ¥è¯¢é”€å”®æ•°æ®å¹¶å‘é‚®ä»¶ç»™è€æ¿æ±‡æŠ¥"})

3.3 æ–¹æ¡ˆäºŒï¼šä½¿ç”¨ OpenAI Function Calling

from openai import OpenAI
import json

client = OpenAI()

# 1. å®šä¹‰å·¥å…· Schema
tools = [
    {
        "type": "function",
        "function": {
            "name": "get_weather",
            "description": "è·å–æŒ‡å®šåŸå¸‚çš„å¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯",
            "parameters": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                    "city": {"type": "string", "description": "åŸå¸‚åç§°"},
                    "unit": {"type": "string", "enum": ["celsius", "fahrenheit"]}
                },
                "required": ["city"]
            }
        }
    },
    {
        "type": "function", 
        "function": {
            "name": "search_web",
            "description": "åœ¨ç½‘ç»œä¸Šæœç´¢ä¿¡æ¯",
            "parameters": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                    "query": {"type": "string", "description": "æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯"}
                },
                "required": ["query"]
            }
        }
    }
]

# 2. å®ç°å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°
def get_weather(city: str, unit: str = "celsius") -> str:
    return f"{city}å¤©æ°”ï¼šæ™´ï¼Œ25Â°C"

def search_web(query: str) -> str:
    return f"æœç´¢'{query}'çš„ç»“æœï¼š..."

available_functions = {
    "get_weather": get_weather,
    "search_web": search_web
}

# 3. Agent æ‰§è¡Œå¾ªç¯
def run_agent(user_message: str):
    messages = [{"role": "user", "content": user_message}]
    
    while True:
        response = client.chat.completions.create(
            model="gpt-4",
            messages=messages,
            tools=tools,
            tool_choice="auto"
        )
        
        assistant_message = response.choices[0].message
        messages.append(assistant_message)
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…·
        if assistant_message.tool_calls:
            for tool_call in assistant_message.tool_calls:
                func_name = tool_call.function.name
                func_args = json.loads(tool_call.function.arguments)
                
                # æ‰§è¡Œå·¥å…·
                func = available_functions[func_name]
                result = func(**func_args)
                
                # å°†ç»“æœåŠ å…¥æ¶ˆæ¯
                messages.append({
                    "role": "tool",
                    "tool_call_id": tool_call.id,
                    "content": result
                })
        else:
            # æ²¡æœ‰å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œè¿”å›æœ€ç»ˆç»“æœ
            return assistant_message.content

# 4. è¿è¡Œ
print(run_agent("åŒ—äº¬å¤©æ°”æ€ä¹ˆæ ·ï¼Ÿ"))

3.4 æ–¹æ¡ˆä¸‰ï¼šå¤š Agent åä½œç³»ç»Ÿ

# ä½¿ç”¨ LangGraph æ„å»ºå¤šAgentç³»ç»Ÿ
from langgraph.graph import StateGraph, END
from typing import TypedDict, Annotated
import operator

class AgentState(TypedDict):
    messages: Annotated[list, operator.add]
    next_agent: str

# å®šä¹‰ä¸“ä¸šAgent
def researcher_agent(state: AgentState) -> AgentState:
    """ç ”ç©¶å‘˜Agent - è´Ÿè´£ä¿¡æ¯æœé›†"""
    # å®ç°ç ”ç©¶é€»è¾‘
    return {"messages": ["ç ”ç©¶ç»“æœ..."], "next_agent": "writer"}

def writer_agent(state: AgentState) -> AgentState:
    """å†™ä½œAgent - è´Ÿè´£å†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆ"""
    # å®ç°å†™ä½œé€»è¾‘
    return {"messages": ["ç”Ÿæˆçš„å†…å®¹..."], "next_agent": "reviewer"}

def reviewer_agent(state: AgentState) -> AgentState:
    """å®¡æ ¸Agent - è´Ÿè´£è´¨é‡æŠŠæ§"""
    # å®ç°å®¡æ ¸é€»è¾‘
    return {"messages": ["å®¡æ ¸æ„è§..."], "next_agent": "end"}

# æ„å»ºå·¥ä½œæµå›¾
workflow = StateGraph(AgentState)
workflow.add_node("researcher", researcher_agent)
workflow.add_node("writer", writer_agent)
workflow.add_node("reviewer", reviewer_agent)

workflow.set_entry_point("researcher")
workflow.add_edge("researcher", "writer")
workflow.add_edge("writer", "reviewer")
workflow.add_edge("reviewer", END)

# ç¼–è¯‘å¹¶è¿è¡Œ
app = workflow.compile()
result = app.invoke({"messages": ["è¯·å†™ä¸€ç¯‡å…³äºAIçš„æ–‡ç« "], "next_agent": "researcher"})

4.3 è‡ªå®šä¹‰å·¥å…·å¼€å‘

from langchain.tools import BaseTool, tool
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import Type

# æ–¹å¼ä¸€ï¼šä½¿ç”¨è£…é¥°å™¨ï¼ˆç®€å•ï¼‰
@tool
def multiply(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    """å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°å­—ç›¸ä¹˜"""
    return a * b

# æ–¹å¼äºŒï¼šç»§æ‰¿ BaseToolï¼ˆå¤æ‚åœºæ™¯ï¼‰
class CalculatorInput(BaseModel):
    expression: str = Field(description="æ•°å­¦è¡¨è¾¾å¼")

class CalculatorTool(BaseTool):
    name: str = "calculator"
    description: str = "ç”¨äºè®¡ç®—æ•°å­¦è¡¨è¾¾å¼"
    args_schema: Type[BaseModel] = CalculatorInput
    
    def _run(self, expression: str) -> str:
        try:
            result = eval(expression)
            return f"è®¡ç®—ç»“æœ: {result}"
        except Exception as e:
            return f"è®¡ç®—é”™è¯¯: {str(e)}"
    
    async def _arun(self, expression: str) -> str:
        return self._run(expression)
